mapper.select: select no, product_name, product_price, product_short_explain, displayed, selling, use_option, use_stock, stock, soldout_mark, save_percentage, shipping_price from product

select p.no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_short_explain, p.displayed, p.selling, p.use_option, p.use_stock, p.stock, p.soldout_mark, p.save_percentage, p.shipping_price from product_category as pc left join product as p on pc.product_no = p.no where pc.category_no IN (#{join_no_list});
select no from op where product_no = #{product_no} ORDER BY op_order ASC
SELECT p.no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.stock, p.use_stock, p.displayed, p.selling, p.use_option, p.save_percentage, p.shipping_price FROM product AS p WHERE p.no = #{value}
SELECT no, op_name, op_explain, op_order, product_no FROM op WHERE product_no = #{no} ORDER BY op_order ASC
SELECT no, opd_name, opd_order, is_use, plus_price, option_no FROM opd WHERE option_no = #{value} ORDER BY opd_order ASC
SELECT no, po_name, po_code, stock, use_stock, selling, displayed, plus_price, po_order, product_no FROM product_option WHERE product_no = #{value} ORDER BY po_order ASC
